text: Phase 1: Sugar activation — Glucose is phosphorylated by ATP to fructose-6-bisphosphate — It is phosphorylated again by a second ATP, resulting in fructose-1,6-bisphosphate — This phase referred to as energy investment phase because input of energy is required » 2 ATP used up will be recouped later Provides activation energy needed to start pathway — Acts to “prime” system
